name: 江怡君
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。

18	Final English Campus-wide Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Mid-term student skit * 25% (期中短劇)
��	
Final talent shows * 25% (期末才藝表演)

Writing Consultation * 30% 
��	
Class Performance * 20% (課堂表現)
��	

(輔導課程成績) Total grade of this remedial course will be factored into 21% of the final grade of English in Practice (英文閱讀與聽講練習：初級).

(出席) One absence is without penalty. Otherwise, if a student is absent for one class, 10 points will be deducted from his or her final grade.
materials: Interactions 1—Listening / Speaking (by J. Tanka etc., McGraw Hill)
